betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Well, I do not have to interact with the nightmare anymore, but I think I want to.
What I have experienced in Vethea is what being a Fractallite means. Carrying hopes and aspirations, dreams and desires. That is what I did there, and I want to do the same here.
At the end of the day, technology is my way of seeing the world, and there is technology to be made out of Vethea.
Lumps are going to be quite useful in my future endeavors!
